rules_text:
{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 2 life.
{B}, Reappropriate: Gain 2 life. [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“All restrictions on battlefield conduct are now void. To save this world from itself, there is no deed we are allowed to deplore.”[/i]
